name: Straight Away
description:
Hi, 

Here is my progress along the way of learning game dev.

This one mini game is only 1 very short level witch goal is just to survive until you've destroyed the last bad guy ( spoiler : that's a green one ^^ ).

You can redo it until you find the way to make it in the shortest time lap.

My best time is 43 second...

So yes... that's a very short game, but i tried to make it simple to add levels and ennemies types, so it is not impossible that i add some stuff to this proto one day or another, but for the moment i have to go back to the courses and progress in my learning.

Have fun !
